alert.note: Alert for Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN IRON AND WEST CENTRAL ASHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashland, or 32 miles west of Ironwood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Odanah around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Odanah, Franks Field, Bad River Reservation and Birch Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
